author: Manikanta Bharatula
description: A web-based implementation of the classic Tic-Tac-Toe game, allowing two players to compete with dynamic game logic.
features: Dynamic DOM manipulation for game board updates
Responsive design for various screen sizes

fileStructure.index.html: Main HTML file containing the game board and UI
fileStructure.script.js: JavaScript logic for game rules, player turns, and UI updates

plannedFeatures: Add single-player mode with Computer as opponent
Track player scores across multiple games
